item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1457; 08:53PM; 11060 W La Grange Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HmE0bf; West Los Angeles; It took 41 firefighters 28 minutes to locate, confine, and extinguish the fire. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 59; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 BC4 BC9 CM42 E19 E237 E263 E292 E295 E59 E62 EM9 RA62 RA892 RA92 T37 T63 T95; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1457; 08:25PM; 11060 W La Grange Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HmE0bf; West Los Angeles; Three-story apartment building (first level parking) with fire showing from the top floor. Offensive mode.; FS 59; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 BC9 E237 E263 E292 E59 E62 RA892 RA92 T37 T63; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1063; 04:05PM; 6050 S Madden Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MfukDl; Hyde Park; The first 30 firefighters extinguished flames in an add-on portion to the rear of a one-story craftsman-style single-family home in 15 minutes. Fire consumed approximately half of the house before firefighters mounted a rapid and coordinated attack between interior hose lines and rooftop ventilation to quickly snuff it out. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation. ; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E266 E294 E57 E66 RA266 RA66 RA866 T66 T94; CH7; 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1063; 03:50PM; 6050 S Madden Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MfukDl; Hyde Park; One-story single-family home with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E266 E294 E57 E66 RA266 RA66 RA866 T66 T94; CH9; 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0292; 06:45AM; 21031 W Roscoe Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3piGCAW; Canoga Park; 32 firefighters extinguished the flames in one unit of a two-story garden-style apartment building in 16 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 104; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 E104 E106 E296 E305 E72 EM17 RA104 RA72 T105 T96; CH9; 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0282; 06:16AM; 12225 N San Fernando Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vhHTf7; Sylmar; 22 firefighters extinguished fire in one room of a one-story garden-style motel in 12 minutes (6:28am). One person was found deceased at the scene. LAFD Fire Investigators have been notified. Fire cause under investigation. Nothing further.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E298 E91 E98 EM15 RA891 RA91 RA98 T75 T98; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0179; 04:36AM; 2319 W 54th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vimGlw; Hyde Park; *Corrected Address* Firefighters found fire in a two-story center-hallway apartment building that spread from one unit into the floor, wall, and attic spaces of the building, and to an adjacent duplex. It took 40 firefighters 63 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. At least five residents will be displaced. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E266 E294 E34 E66 E94 RA266 RA66 SQ21 T33 T66 T94; CH9; 16; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0206; 04:46AM; 1031 E 48th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3phgTsn; South Park; Twenty-six firefighters extinguished the flames in 21 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 21; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 E14 E21 E215 E221 RA21 RA814 T15 T21; CH7; 1 14; Nicholas Prange
